Class Token

java.lang.Object
  Token

public class Token
extends java.lang.Object

class Token represents a tag and argument list Dec. 2012 Update:

  • Added param/value pairs should add a list of attributes/value pairs
    • December 2012
  • store types as uppercase.

    • Discussion of parts of the tag

  • tag: name of the tag
  • attributes: a list of attributes and values for the tag if they exist

    • ex. the tag would have a zero length parameter list, with tag=HTML

    Version:
    November 2012
    Author:
    J. Smith

    getFirstAttribute

    public AttributePair getFirstAttribute()
    This method is available primarily to assist in the non-list stage of the CS2 assignment.

    Returns:
    the first AttributePair or null if there are no attributes
